Fatboy Slim returns as the unofficial ambassador to Brasil, and has delivered a lovingly curated collection of music encapsulating the soundtrack to this year's biggest event... The World Cup. Fatboy Slim presents Bem Brasil features brand new tracks and remixes by DJ Fresh, Gregor Salto, Psychemagik, Eats Everything, Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike, Claude Von Stroke, Joey Negro.

Fatboy Slim has captured both sides of the Brasilian lifestyle by splitting Bem Brasil into two discs. The first, Para Noite/Night Time , is the sound of Brasil s nightlife. A full line of absolute party bangers from the likes DJ Fresh, Gregor Salto, Fatboy Slim himself and many more. Para Noite is the sound of carnivals and late night beach parties.
The second disc, Para Dia/Day Time , represents the chilled, sun kissed vibes of Rio. Featuring producers including John Digweed, Greg Wilson and Claude Vonstroke, Para Dia combines relaxed beats with beautiful melodies.
With only weeks left before the first ball meets boot in Brasil, Fatboy and his compatriots are here to get the carnival started early.
